#### Pacific Region - Cost Consulting Services Standing Offer
[Title]
[Ref Number]

##### Invitation to Tender

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified consulting firms to submit abbreviated proposals for the establishment of a Standing Offer (SO) to provide "as and when required" cost consulting services for the Department of National Defence (DND) in the Pacific Region.

The SO will be established through November 23, 2025, and may be extended for up to one additional year if mutually agreed upon by the Consultant and DCC. The maximum estimated value of the SO is $150,000.

The Contracting Entity (DCC) is seeking a consultant to provide services for the following Positions:
- Project Manager
- Senior PQS/CEC professional
- Intermediate PQS/CEC professional
- Total Classification Rate

Bidding and Documents are available on [MERX website](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; refer to [MERX pricing information](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more details.

##### Submission Instructions

Firms interested in providing these services are invited to submit their abbreviated proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System. Proposals must be submitted by the tender closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.

##### Evaluation Criteria

Information provided by proponents will be evaluated using the established criteria in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

##### Security Requirements

The security requirements for this project are identified in the RFP documents.

##### Additional Information

Please refer to the RFP document for additional information on call-ups, conditions, and exclusions.

##### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
- Name: Andrew Webster
- Email: andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
- Phone: 613-949-7930

You may view the Notice of Invitation to Tender and the Ministry's website for additional information. Proposers can obtain contract award results from the Ministry's website at [Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada](https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca). [Contract Activity URL]***
